name: ABC GAME (alea63186)
description:
'ABC Game' is an easy card game.

How To Play    

  1.  Every turn, Player selects one of the three random cards.
  2.  Dealer checks the remaining two cards and has one.
  3.  Player guesses what cards are left.
    1) If Player get it right, Player will get Points by the two cards.
      1-1) A&B : + 600 Points
      1-2) A&C : + 300 Points
      1-3) B&C : + 100 Points
    2) If Player get it wrong, Player lose one token.
  4. 4. Game ends when the token reaches zero.

Try to get as many points as you can.
